name: Galactic Mini-Golf Contest
description:
Galactic Mini-Golf Contest is a golfing game set in space, challenging the player to complete a series of mini-golf levels while dealing with the dangers of outer space, like gravity, space debris and even black holes !

Controls:

Don't forget : Mini-Golf is not quite the same in space !
